issue.title: [PATCH] Gazebo 1.5 - SensorContainer::RunLoop() - Default maxUpdateRate causes a large sleep time to be requested

content.raw: Looking at it again, it does look like comparing std::numeric_limits<double>::min() against the default SDF update_rate, 0, is the culprit. Changed it to zero (updated patch), so maybe that is a slightly cleaner fix.
